cause.description:
Love it, don't fight it. Homosexuals should have the right to marry when and where they please. It is unfair that the right to be wed as a homosexual has not yet been broadly established or accepted.
1. Gays should be allowed to get married wherever they want, we're humans too!
2. Gay marriage needs active support to become law not apathy
3. Gay marriage needs your involvement
cause.mission: Get people to vote and support gay marriage
cause.name: Support Gay Marriage
